hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select trd.f_child_pid,d1.f_dic_name as f_child_name ,case when trd.f_parent_pid= ? then null else trd.f_parent_pid end as f_parent_id ,d.f_dic_name as f_parent_name,d1.f_value2,? as f_parent_pids,d1.f_value3 from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic d,t_pub_dic d1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_child_pid = d1.f_pid and d1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_parent_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = '10001' and trd.f_obj_ref_pid='10000' order by d.f_dic_name,d1.f_num1

select trd.f_child_pid as id,d1.f_dic_name as name ,trd.f_parent_pid as pid from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic d,t_pub_dic d1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_child_pid = d1.f_pid and d1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_parent_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? order by d.f_dic_name,d1.f_num1

select trd.f_child_pid as id,d1.f_dic_name as name ,trd.f_parent_pid as pid,d.f_dic_name as f_parent_name,d.f_num1,d1.f_value2,d1.f_pid from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic d,t_pub_dic d1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_child_pid = d1.f_pid and d1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_parent_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? and trd.f_parent_pid= ? order by d.f_dic_name,d1.f_num1
hibernate-mapping.query: select new tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TreeNode(trd.childId,d1.name,trd.parentId,d.name,d.num1,d1.value2,d1.id,osr.objRefId,d1.type) from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TypeRefDic as trd, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef as oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr,tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic as d,tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic as d1 where trd.objEntityRefId = oef.id and trd.sysFlag = 1 and oef.id = osr.objRefId and oef.sysFlag = 1 and trd.childId = d1.id and d1.sysFlag =1 and trd.parentId = d.id and d.sysFlag =1 and osr.structureId = ? order by d.name,d1.num1
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select trd.f_child_pid,p0.f_dic_name as f_child_name,case when trd.f_parent_pid= ? then null else trd.f_parent_pid end as f_parent_id, p1.f_dic_name as f_parent_name,p0.f_value2,? as f_parent_pids,p0.f_value3 from t_pub_typerefdic trd inner join t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef on trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and oef.f_sys_flag='1' inner join t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr on oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = '10001' inner join t_sec_resource rs on trd.f_child_pid = rs.f_target_id inner join t_sec_role_permission rp on rs.f_pid = rp.f_resource_id inner join t_sec_user_r_role ur on rp.f_role_id = ur.f_role_id inner join t_sec_user u on ur.f_user_id = u.f_pid and u.f_pid= ? and u.f_sys_flag='1' inner join t_pub_dic p0 on p0.f_pid = trd.f_child_pid and p0.f_sys_flag='1' inner join t_pub_dic p1 on p1.f_pid = trd.f_parent_pid and p1.f_sys_flag='1' where trd.f_sys_flag='1' and trd.f_obj_ref_pid='10000' order by p1.f_dic_name,p0.f_num1

select trd.f_child_pid,d1.f_dic_name as f_child_name,trd.f_parent_pid ,d.f_dic_name as f_parent_name,d.f_num1,d1.f_value2,d1.f_value3 from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic d,t_pub_dic d1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_child_pid = d1.f_pid and d1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_parent_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? order by d.f_dic_name,d1.f_num1

select distinct trd.f_parent_pid as f_id,osr.f_structure_pid as f_pid,dic1.f_dic_name as f_name,dic1.f_num1,dic1.f_pid as keyid from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef,t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic dic,t_pub_dic dic1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_parent_pid = dic1.f_pid and dic1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_child_pid = dic.f_pid and dic.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? order by dic1.f_num1

select trd.f_child_pid as f_id,trd.f_parent_pid as f_pid,dic.f_dic_name as f_name,dic1.f_num1,dic.f_pid as keyid from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr, t_pub_dic dic,t_pub_dic dic1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_parent_pid = dic1.f_pid and dic1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_child_pid = dic.f_pid and dic.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? order by dic1.f_num1

select trd.f_child_pid as f_id,trd.f_parent_pid as f_pid,dic.f_dic_name as f_name,dic1.f_num1 from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr, t_pub_dic dic,t_pub_dic dic1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_parent_pid = dic1.f_pid and dic1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_child_pid = dic.f_pid and dic.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? order by dic1.f_num1
hibernate-mapping.query: select new tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase(t.id, t.code ,t.name,t.sysFlag,t.remark) from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase t where t.sysFlag = '1' and t.code like ? and t.name like ? and t.superClass.id=?
select new tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase(id, name ) from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase t where t.sysFlag = '1' and t.id = ? and t.superClass.id = ? and t.sysFlag = ?
from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef T where T.sysFlag = '1' and T.code like ? and T.name like ? and T.parentId = ? and T.childId = ? and T.sysFlag = ? order by T.code
from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic T where T.sysFlag = '1' and T.code like ? and T.name like ? and T.type = ? and T.sysFlag = ? order by T.num1,T.name
select new tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase( id, name ,code,sysFlag,remark ) from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase T where T.code like ? and T.name like ? and T.superClass.id=?
from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TypeRefDic as t where t.childId=?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t.f_pid,t.f_obj_name as f_name,t.f_superclass_pid,d.f_obj_name from t_pub_obj_base t,t_pub_obj_base d where t.f_superclass_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_Sys_Flag='1' and t.f_Sys_Flag='1' and t.f_superclass_pid= ?
hibernate-mapping.query: from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic where type= ? and sysFlag='1' order by num1
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select trd.f_child_pid,d1.f_dic_name as f_child_name ,trd.f_parent_pid,d.f_dic_name as f_parent_name,d1.f_value2,d1.f_pid from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic d,t_pub_dic d1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_child_pid = d1.f_pid and d1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_parent_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? order by d.f_num1

select trd.f_child_pid,d1.f_dic_name as f_child_name,trd.f_parent_pid ,d.f_dic_name as f_parent_name,d.f_num1,d1.f_value2,d1.f_pid,osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID as objrefpid,d1.F_OBJ_PID from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oef, t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr,t_pub_dic d,t_pub_dic d1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oef.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = 1 and oef.f_pid = osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID and oef.f_sys_flag = 1 and trd.f_child_pid = d1.f_pid and d1.f_sys_flag =1 and trd.f_parent_pid = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag =1 and osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? and trd.f_obj_ref_pid = ? order by d.f_num1

select trd.f_parent_pid,trd.f_child_pid,t1.f_obj_ref_pid from t_pub_typerefdic trd,t_pub_obj_entity_ref t,t_pub_obj_structure_ref t1 where trd.F_OBJ_REF_PID = t.f_pid and t1.f_obj_ref_pid = t.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag='1' and t.f_sys_flag='1' and t1.f_structure_pid = ? and trd.f_child_pid is null
hibernate-mapping.query: select dic from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic as dic, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TypeRefDic as trd, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr where dic.id = trd.childId and trd.objEntityRefId = oef.id and dic.sysFlag = '1' and trd.sysFlag = '1' and oef.id = osr.objRefId and oef.sysFlag = 1 and trd.parentId = ? and osr.structureId = ? and dic.type = ? and dic.code like ? and dic.name like ?

select dic from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic as dic, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TypeRefDic as trd, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr where dic.id = trd.childId and trd.objEntityRefId = oef.id and dic.sysFlag = '1' and trd.sysFlag = '1' and oef.id = osr.objRefId and oef.sysFlag = 1 and trd.parentId = ? and osr.structureId = '10001' and trd.objEntityRefId = ? and dic.name like ? and dic.code like ?

select trd from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TypeRefDic as trd, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef as oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr where trd.objEntityRefId = oef.id and trd.parentId = ? and trd.sysFlag = 1 and oef.id = osr.objRefId and oef.sysFlag = 1 and osr.structureId = ?

SELECT oef FROM tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef as oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic as d where osr.objRefId = oef.id AND oef.parentId = d.type AND d.sysFlag='1' and oef.sysFlag = 1 AND osr.structureId = ? AND d.id = ?

select oef from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef as oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr where oef.id = osr.objRefId and osr.structureId = ? and oef.parentId in (select ref.childId from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef as ref where ref.id = ?)
select trd from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.TypeRefDic as trd, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic as dic where trd.childId = ? and trd.childId = dic.id and trd.sysFlag = 1 and dic.sysFlag='1'
from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructure as os where os.sysFlag = 1 and os.accessControlId = '4028a07b246a97c201246a9aea380002' order by os.name
from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructure as os where os.code like ? and os.name like ? and os.sysFlag = '1' order by os.code
select oef from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef as oef, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr where oef.id = osr.objRefId and osr.structureId = ?
from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef as osr where osr.structureId = ?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select d.f_pid, d.f_dic_code, d.f_dic_name, d.f_value1, d.f_obj_pid from (select t.f_pid, t.f_dic_code, t.f_dic_name, t.f_value1, t.f_obj_pid, tt.id,t.f_sys_flag from t_pub_dic t left outer join (select trd.f_parent_pid as id from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oer, t_pub_obj_structure_ref ref where trd.f_obj_ref_pid = oer.f_pid and trd.f_sys_flag = '1' and oer.f_parent_pid = ? and oer.f_pid = ref.f_obj_ref_pid and ref.f_structure_pid = ? union select trd.f_child_pid as id from t_pub_typerefdic trd, t_pub_obj_entity_ref oer, t_pub_obj_structure_ref ref where trd.f_obj_ref_pid = oer.f_pid and trd.f_parent_pid in (select t.f_pid from t_pub_dic t where t.f_sys_flag='1' ) and trd.f_sys_flag = '1' and oer.f_child_pid = ? and oer.f_pid = ref.f_obj_ref_pid and ref.f_structure_pid = ? ) as tt on t.f_pid = tt.id and t.f_sys_flag = '1') as d where d.id is null and d.f_sys_flag = '1' and d.f_obj_pid = ? and f_dic_name like ?
hibernate-mapping.query: from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic T where T.type = '10000' and T.sysFlag = '1' and T.value2 = ?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT d.F_PID,d.F_OBJ_CODE AS F_CODE,d.F_OBJ_NAME AS F_NAME,'1' AS F_INDEX FROM t_pub_obj_base d,t_pub_obj_entity_ref oer,t_pub_obj_structure_ref osr WHERE osr.F_OBJ_REF_PID = oer.F_PID AND oer.F_CHILD_PID = d.F_PID AND d.F_SYS_FLAG='1' AND oer.F_SYS_FLAG='1' AND osr.F_STRUCTURE_PID = ? AND oer.F_PARENT_PID = ?
SELECT F_PID,F_TYPE_CODE AS F_CODE,F_TYPE_NAME AS F_NAME,'1' AS F_INDEX FROM t_pub_obj_type WHERE F_SYS_FLAG = '1'
select f_pid, f_dic_code as f_code, f_dic_name as f_name from t_pub_dic where f_sys_flag = '1' and f_obj_pid = '4028a0fc249f849401249f93ca010002' order by f_num1
hibernate-mapping.query: select new tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase(t.id, t.code ,t.name,t.sysFlag,t.remark) from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase t where t.sysFlag = '1' and t.id=?
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select f_pid,f_obj_id,f_attribute_code,f_attribute_name,f_sys_flag,f_attribute_column ,f_attribute_pk,f_class_type,f_order,f_allow_blank,f_verify_rule,f_create_time from t_pub_obj_attribute where f_sys_flag = '1' and f_obj_id = ?
hibernate-mapping.query: select new tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase(t.id, t.code ,t.name,t.sysFlag,t.remark,t1.id) from tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjBase t, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjEntityRef t1, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.Dic t2, tw.sysbase.entity.pub.ObjStructureRef t3 where t.id = t1.childId and t1.parentId = t2.type and t1.id = t3.objRefId and t.sysFlag = '1' and t1.sysFlag = '1' and t2.sysFlag = '1' and t3.structureId = ? and t2.id = ?
